title: Madrid: capital de Espana
creator_credit: Egons Tomsons and International Film Bureau
brief_description: A Spanish language film for first year Spanish students. Views of Madrid, Spain: the principle streets, the airport, Spain’s tallest building, monuments and statues, the bull ring and bullfight. Visits the Prado Museum featuring paintings by El Greco, Goya and Velasquez. Narration by Juan Manuel Garcia.
